title: News

hero.heading: News & Updates

sections.heading: Latest News
sections.content: Stay up to date with the latest news, announcements, and updates from the Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association.

sections.heading: New Wisconsin State Hall of Famers!
sections.content: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 1992), Rob Schuh (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 2015), and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame! Read more about their accomplishments [here](https://wibowl.com/wisconsin-bowling-hall-of-fame-announces-2025-inductees/)!
